general.name: spAll-lite_epoch
general.short: Summary spectroscopic information for the BOSS spectrograph data field epoch coadds
general.description: This file contains a summary of the BOSS idlspec2d and spectro-1d pipeline outputs every field-mjd-target for field epoch coadds

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

releases.name: DR19
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

FIELD.name: FIELD
FIELD.description: SDSS FieldID (plateID for plate era data)

MJD.name: MJD
MJD.description: Modified Julian date of combined Spectra

MJD_FINAL.name: MJD_FINAL
MJD_FINAL.description: Mean MJD of the Coadded Spectra

EXPTIME.name: EXPTIME
EXPTIME.description: Total Exposure time of Coadded Spectra

TARGET_INDEX.name: TARGET_INDEX
TARGET_INDEX.description: Index of target on combined spField

PROGRAMNAME.name: PROGRAMNAME
PROGRAMNAME.description: Program name within a given survey

SURVEY.name: SURVEY
SURVEY.description: Survey that field is part of

OBJTYPE.name: OBJTYPE
OBJTYPE.description: Why this object was targeted.  Note that if this field says QSO, it could be the case that this object would have been targetted as a GALAXY or any number of other categories as well. The PRIMTARGET and SECTARGET flags in the plug-map structure (in the spField file) gives this full information.

SPECOBJID.name: SPECOBJID
SPECOBJID.description: Unique ID based on Field, MJD, SDSSID, RUN2D, COADD type

CALIBFLUX.name: CALIBFLUX
CALIBFLUX.description: Broad-band flux in SDSS-{ugriz} from PSFmag

CALIBFLUX_IVAR.name: CALIBFLUX_IVAR
CALIBFLUX_IVAR.description: Inverse var flux SDSS-{ugriz} from PSFmag

OPTICAL_PROV.name: OPTICAL_PROV
OPTICAL_PROV.description: The source of the optical CATDB_MAG magnitudes

MAG.name: MAG
MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical magnitudes

PSFMAG.name: PSFMAG
PSFMAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical PSF magnitudes

FIBER2MAG.name: FIBER2MAG
FIBER2MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] optical Fiber2 magnitudes

CATDB_MAG.name: CATDB_MAG
CATDB_MAG.description: [u, g, r, i, z] Raw TargetDB magnitudes

GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.name: GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM
GRI_GAIA_TRANSFORM.description: provenance of photometry in SDSS-V plate design

WISE_MAG.name: WISE_MAG
WISE_MAG.description: WISE [W1, W2, W3, W4] band magnitudes

FIBER_RA.name: FIBER_RA
FIBER_RA.description: Fiber RA [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

FIBER_DEC.name: FIBER_DEC
FIBER_DEC.description: Fiber DEC [J2000 for plate; at exp for FPS]

RACAT.name: RACAT
RACAT.description: Catalog RA in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

DECCAT.name: DECCAT
DECCAT.description: Catalog DEC in ICRS coordinates at coord_epoch

COORD_EPOCH.name: COORD_EPOCH
COORD_EPOCH.description: Epoch of the RACAT/DECCAT Catalog coordinates.

PMRA.name: PMRA
PMRA.description: Proper motion in RA (pmra is a true angle)

DELTA_RA.name: DELTA_RA
DELTA_RA.description: The maximum fiber offset in any exposure

DELTA_DEC.name: DELTA_DEC
DELTA_DEC.description: The maximum fiber offset in any exposure

FIBER_OFFSET.name: FIBER_OFFSET
FIBER_OFFSET.description: Flag identifying the fiber was offset by design

LAMBDA_EFF.name: LAMBDA_EFF
LAMBDA_EFF.description: Wavelength to optimize hole location for

HEALPIX.name: HEALPIX
HEALPIX.description: healpix pixel number of the RACAT and DECCAT coordinates, computed with healpix nside=128

FIELDSN2.name: FIELDSN2
FIELDSN2.description: Overall (S/N)^2 for field; min of cameras

SPEC1_G.name: SPEC1_G
SPEC1_G.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at g=20.20 for spectrograph 1 (same value for 500 fibers)

SPEC1_R.name: SPEC1_R
SPEC1_R.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at r=20.25 for spectrograph 1 (same value for 500 fibers)

SPEC1_I.name: SPEC1_I
SPEC1_I.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at i=19.90 for spectrograph 1 (same value for 500 fibers)

SPEC2_G.name: SPEC2_G
SPEC2_G.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at g=20.20 for spectrograph 2 (same value for 500 fibers)

SPEC2_R.name: SPEC2_R
SPEC2_R.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at r=20.25 for spectrograph 2 (same value for 500 fibers)

SPEC2_I.name: SPEC2_I
SPEC2_I.description: Fit (S/N)^2 at i=19.90 for spectrograph 2 (same value for 500 fibers)

SN_MEDIAN.name: SN_MEDIAN
SN_MEDIAN.description: Median S/N for all good pixels in SDSS-{ugriz}

SN_MEDIAN_ALL.name: SN_MEDIAN_ALL
SN_MEDIAN_ALL.description: Median S/N for all good pixels in all filters

MOON_DIST.name: MOON_DIST
MOON_DIST.description: Mean Moon-target separation of Coadded Spectra

MOON_PHASE.name: MOON_PHASE
MOON_PHASE.description: Mean Moon phase of the Coadded Spectra

ASSIGNED.name: ASSIGNED
ASSIGNED.description: Whether this fibre was assigned to a target

ON_TARGET.name: ON_TARGET
ON_TARGET.description: Whether this fibre is on target

VALID.name: VALID
VALID.description: alpha and beta angles are valid

DECOLLIDED.name: DECOLLIDED
DECOLLIDED.description: this positioner had to be moved to decollide it

ANYANDMASK.name: ANYANDMASK
ANYANDMASK.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ANDMASK

ANYORMASK.name: ANYORMASK
ANYORMASK.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ORMASK

SPECPRIMARY.name: SPECPRIMARY
SPECPRIMARY.description: Objects observed multiple times will have this set to 1 for one observation only. This is usually the 'best' observation, as defined by critera listed in fieldmerge.py.

SPECBOSS.name: SPECBOSS
SPECBOSS.description: Best version of spectrum at this location

SPECTROSKYFLUX.name: SPECTROSKYFLUX
SPECTROSKYFLUX.description: Sky spectrum projected onto SDSS-{ugriz} filter

WCOVERAGE.name: WCOVERAGE
WCOVERAGE.description: Amount of wavelength coverage in log-10(Angs)

Z.name: Z
Z.description: Redshift; incorrect for nonzero ZWARNING flag

Z_ERR.name: Z_ERR
Z_ERR.description: z error from chi^2 min; negative is invalid fit

ZWARNING.name: ZWARNING
ZWARNING.description: A flag for bad z fits in place of CLASS=UNKNOWN

DOF.name: DOF
DOF.description: Degrees of freedom for best fit

RCHI2DIFF.name: RCHI2DIFF
RCHI2DIFF.description: Diff in reduced chi^2 of 2 best solutions

VDISP.name: VDISP
VDISP.description: Velocity dispersion, only computed for galaxies

VDISP_ERR.name: VDISP_ERR
VDISP_ERR.description: Error in VDISP; negative for invalid fit

VDISPNPIX.name: VDISPNPIX
VDISPNPIX.description: Num of pixels overlapping VDISP fit templates

VDISPDOF.name: VDISPDOF
VDISPDOF.description: Degrees of freedom for best-fit velocity dispersion, equal to VDISPNPIX minus the number of templates minus the number of polynomial terms minus 1 (the last 1 is for the velocity dispersion)

CHI68P.name: CHI68P
CHI68P.description: 68% of abs(chi) of synthetic to actual spectrum

Z_NOQSO.name: Z_NOQSO
Z_NOQSO.description: Redshift of the best-fit non-QSO model (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

Z_ERR_NOQSO.name: Z_ERR_NOQSO
Z_ERR_NOQSO.description: Formal one-sigma error on Z_NOQSO (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

ZNUM_NOQSO.name: ZNUM_NOQSO
ZNUM_NOQSO.description: Best fit z/class index excluding QSO; 1-indexed (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

ZWARNING_NOQSO.name: ZWARNING_NOQSO
ZWARNING_NOQSO.description: Redshift warning flag for Z_NOQSO (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

CLASS_NOQSO.name: CLASS_NOQSO
CLASS_NOQSO.description: Spectro class of best-fit non-QSO model (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

SUBCLASS_NOQSO.name: SUBCLASS_NOQSO
SUBCLASS_NOQSO.description: Spectro sub-class of best-fit non-QSO model (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)

RCHI2DIFF_NOQSO.name: RCHI2DIFF_NOQSO
RCHI2DIFF_NOQSO.description: Reduced chi^2 diff to next-best non-QSO model (recommended for CMASS and LOZ)
